titles.title: BLEACH [破面･VS.死神篇 総集編]

data.title: Bleach Special: Hueco Mundo Recap
data.title_japanese: BLEACH [破面･VS.死神篇 総集編]
data.synopsis:
After Orihime Inoue is abducted by Sousuke Aizen, Ichigo Kurosaki and his friends infiltrate the world of the Hollows known as Hueco Mundo. Waiting for them there are battles beyond anything they have ever experienced as the ten Espada lie in wait.

After his fight with Grimmjow, Ichigo is forced to fight against the fifth Espada, Nnoitra, before recovering from his wounds. Just as all hope is lost, Nel reveals a secret she has been hiding. Meanwhile, Renji Abarai and Uryu Ishida are forced to fight against the eigth Espada, Szayel Aporro. How will they fare against an opponent that holds the ability to crush their body to pieces with the touch of a voodoo doll? 

(Source: PassThePopcorn)
data.background: A recap disk included with the fourth volume of the "Espada VS Soul Reapers" arc of the Arrancar Saga. Covers episodes 190-201. (Source: PassThePopcorn)
